resources.string: Login failed, please try again later
Login success, all ready to continue.
Checking root and enable KeyLogger accessibility
Root not found, enable KeyLogger accessibility in \"settings - accessibility - services - child accessibility\"
You need to activate the draw over other apps permission to be able to take photos
You need to activate the "Applications with use access" permission to obtain social credentials
Child accessibility allows users to prevent, or limit access to, their handling, or their content to minors
You need to enable the accessibility service so that the application works correctly.
Permission is required to read contacts, location, record audio, read phone status, receive sms, camera and write storage for this application. Do you want to try again?

Some permissions were denied, without them the application will not work correctly. To activate them you must go to \"Settings - applications - child - permissions\" and activate the corresponding permissions. Do you want to activate them now?
